name: Fluid Sheer Glow Enhancer Highlighter
about: What it is:A lightweight, multiuse complexion enhancer for a dewy glow—use as a highlighter or mix with skincare or foundation for a radiant boost..Coverage:Light.Finish:Radiant.Formulation:Liquid.What Else You Need to Know:Experience weightless perfection with this liquid formula, which melts into skin for a seamless finish, under or over makeup. Sheer, buildable coverage ensures mistake-proof application, allowing you to customize your glow. Available in versatile shades, it can be used as a highlighter, blush, or bronzer. You can also mix it with foundation for a radiance boost.
ingredients: Aqua/Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin, Isododecane, Mica, Alcohol Denat., Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Hexyl Laurate, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Phenoxyethanol, Magnesium Sulfate, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Cellulose Gum, Ci 77491/Iron Oxides, Acrylonitrile/Methyl Methacrylate/Vinylidene Chloride Copolymer, Methylparaben, Nylon-12, Parfum/Fragrance, Trihydroxystearin, Isobutane, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Acetylated Glycol Stearate, Ci 77492/Iron Oxides, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, Linalool, Aluminum Hydroxide, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To wear alone or under foundation, apply a thin layer all over your face..-Mix with Luminous Silk Perfect Glow Flawless Oil-Free Foundation (sold separately) for added glow..-For light to medium skin, use shade 2. For tan to deep skin, use shade 10..-Wear on top of foundation, applying to targeted areas of the face as a highlighter, blush, or bronzer. .-Highlight with shades 2 and 10..-Use shades 8, 5, and 11 as blush. .-Bronze with shades 10 and 11.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Waited so long for this to come back in stock. When I finally got it, I was so disappointed. First of all, it stinks. Second of all, it removed my makeup and three, it pilled. Returned!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, sadly it  does not show no enhancement. I’m light complexion and it just blends right out to nothing,It’s liquid water. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love mixing this with a liquid blush - it provides the prettiest glow and the shimmer is subtle enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin tone is very tan but my face stays way lighter in comparison bc I’m an outdoors person but do all I can to hide my face from sun!!! I hate self tan.  This is the best way to bring a natural tan with just glow and no coverage.  I wear this every day after skincare and I’m obsessed.  I don’t even need to wear any other makeup  just glow and

reviews.review_title: Returned for a Refund and Went Back to Saie
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this product online and felt confident I would like it as much as the Armani Luminous Silk Foundation (my absolute favorite foundation ever). But this highlighter had very distinct sparkly particles that were too large, it was like I put on a glitter paint instead of a nice shimmer that I'm used to with Saie. Returned and exchanged for Saie after testing a bunch of other options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice application and wand for non messy tube and over applying product. It is a cute color which gives a flush look with a bit of shimmer like a summery glisten. It is a bit sheer and doesn’t always mix well with my foundation but overall a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the one thing that I will use every single day if I have to. It is literally a two in one and leaves the nicest and healthiest glow without making you look too pink. ￼
Love the quality ant the way it lays on my make up, I love the texture, the glow that leaves on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I dont feel like this did anything but sink into my skin and leave shimmery particles. Same thing the saie one did, not a fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe I just got the wrong shade but I have a very light complexion so I figured a peachy pink color would work. Unfortunately there is absolutely zero color payoff. It just makes my skin look greasy. For over 40 dollars I feel ripped off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, since the day I’ve tried it, I love the texture, the glow that leaves on the skin, the color is PERFECTION!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product for my birthday and I will be returning it. Whatever ingredient gives this product its shimmer does not mix with the other ingredients. When I took it out of the package, it looked like a mini lava lamp. I violently shook it for a good few minutes and it still separated. After shaking it and testing a drop on my arm, I knew it was a waste of money. The product was still separated and the way this looks after you spread it reminds me of something oily. It’s weird and not cute at all. I love the pink color, but it is not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Switched to this for my foundation…and my skin cleared for the first time in my adult life!!!! And the product looks AH-MAZING on!! I apply the highlighter all over the face, after sunscreen and primer, and then powder it down in the t-zone and spray with a setting spray. Looks like my skin but waaaay better! It stays on, even through crazy humidity and heat, and does not clog my pores!!! Please keep this product and add more shades for other skin tones!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not as much as a highlight/shimmer as it’s advertised and I would not consider this as a blush. This is definitely more matte-like and should be more focused as a bronzer. However,  It is very lightweight, goes on the face well and has a smooth finish

reviews.review_title: I hate that I love this.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous and easy. It is slightly glittery. 11 is great for a subtle bronzey glow on me (note: I'm very pasty pale). This pink is beautiful as a topper or alone for a SUPER subtle glow, no makeup at the beach type look. I don't love the smell but it does dissipate on dry down. I like it better than the similar charlotte tilbury or Dior products.   Overall: gorgeous for pasties. I'm not sure how well it will work if you have more melanin. I'd try in person

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burnt my skin and was straight up glitter for this to be 40+ dollars Armani needs to do better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a pretty glowy pink pigmented highlighter.   It is pricy but so pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this after it went viral from an influencer claiming it was blush and bronzer in one. Disappointed to report it’s barely noticeable on me and I have FAIR skin. I pump it on the back of my hand and use a blush brush to pick up the product and apply to my face, which is exactly how she uses it in her videos. It gives a healthy glow, but it’s far too expensive for there to be hardly any color payoff. I already have plenty of other (more affordable) highlighters that do the same thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I completely LOVE this product! It took the place of my blush and highlighter and after one day at the beach, I don’t even need the bronzer. It’s an amazing addition to my routine. Goes on light and you can build it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Completely my favorite facial product. This gives the perfect glow to my face! I use it as a highlighter and sometimes use it as a slight eye shadow. It’s absolutely beautiful gives you the perfect glow. I first apply a little foundation and put

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great for those natural beats! Not too much pigment, and the perfect light-weight consistency!! It’s also not too subtle, it’s very noticeable but in a good way. I would buy this in every shade, and definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I saw it on TikTok, and was so disappointed. I tried to love it over and over again, but when I’d wear it with other makeup it was so blotchy no matter how I applied it. Even without make up it was bad. Super glittery and the product separated quite a bit. For the steep price, had to rerun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it because it was a viral product, but when I used it, it left a orange stain on my face no matter how much I blended it, not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased both the pink and champagne color options. Both are non-glittery more luminous and glowy.  I use it in tandem with Armani's foundation and it easily layers with that product.  The pink color option provides a nice hint of well-blended cheek color that looks radiant, natural but not overpowering.  I live in a warm climate, spend a lot at the beach and this provides the perfect amount of subtle, healthy highlight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Picked up after seeing the product blow up on Tiktok. Wanted a sheer, luminous glow and thought this product would be the perfect item to achieve that. I was wrong as the product is GLITTER. You can see the chunks of glitter on your skin. Maybe other shades do not have this issue but do not get shade 2 unless you want chunky glitter on your face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried to use this product several different ways to make it work for me (alone as a highlight, mixed with moisturizer & foundation) but unfortunately, I am not a fan. I find this product to have a nice consistency but when I put it on my face it does not add glow, it looks like I put glitter all over my face. If I would have seen the product in-store, I would likely not have purchased because you can see by looking at the bottle that it is definitely more glitter than glow. For the price point, I will be returning and looking for another option that provides more of a luminous/dewy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have shade 10, this is a very nice glow enhancer can be used to bronzer body and face. Consistency is more on the creamy side, It does not enhance texture.

reviews.review_title: So pretty and easy to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Looks stunning on my cheeks. I put a dab on the back of my hand and used a medium blush brush to apply.  Finish is absolutely beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially I wasn’t sure how I felt about this but the more I used it the more I loved it! I really noticed how much this enhanced the sun-kissed look when I didn’t wear it. I’ve used it daily since

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product it left my skin glowing with foundation and without. Not too pigmented so it’s a day or night use. Truly recommend to people looking for a subtle glow.

reviews.review_title: A must have to add on your collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade 8 pink.i love this product a lot Very light and it's giving natural glowy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have found my every day cheek product! Listen, if you want a ton of pigment, this is not for you; however, if you are looking for an insanely gorgeous semi-subtle glow on your cheeks that makes you just look radiant- THIS IS IT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in February and now it forms a congealed white mess with the carrier and the pigment is separated. It’s super gross. I used my Saie sampler over the weekend and can’t believe the difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty glowy highlighter yet natural looking. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shows up much like a blush and is less translucent than the coral color. Doubles as a highlighter for the summer, blends in easily and sits on top of foundation and bronzer well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried to find ANY reason to love this. I tried both shade 5 and 11. I came to realize that it really didn’t do much of anything. I noticed no more “glow” than before. Only in direct sun did I notice the reflection of the fine glitter thats in the product. Too much money with little to no payoff.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my make up routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for 2 weeks I can say it was one of the best purchases. Leaves my skin glowing and smooth without drying. Goes perfect under foundation. Even my sister loves using it. Can't wait to try other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to purchase this because of the price point but it’s worth it. It’s a beautiful shade and finish, and I like that you can build up the product depending on the look you’re going for. The pump dispenses way more than I ned - this bottle will last forever!

reviews.review_title: nice but not what I expected
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice, natural finish blush but mine has next to no shimmer, hardly any illumination at all. It does have a very natural dewy finish, doesn't look oily, so I do like that. However, for a cheaper price, there are several other similar products that will deliver that, I was really wanting the highlight in the name and inproduct image. I essentially received a dewy coral liquid blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this blends beautifully and gives the look of a “full beat” on the face! i will definitely repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product left my skin so luminous! When I applied my foundation over it, it left such a beautiful glow and shimmer. Instead of my skin looking dull like normal it looks glowy. This formula is smooth and creamy and glides on easy. It’s not greasy at all and doesn’t have a fragrant scent. 100% recommended!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was better than expected! I can use it alone or under foundation to get that vaca glow. It’s awesome for mature skin and doesn’t settle into fine lines. Will be a staple in my collection.

reviews.review_title: I will never not use this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this last week not knowing when I was going to use it. Got home and used it with just my sunscreen i wear everyday and I was glowing! I have received so many compliments on my skin glowing!! This is the perfect natural glowing look item or wear to an event! It is absolutely fabulous!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this! I use is all over my face when I don’t want to wear a lot of make up, or as a highlighter. It’s currently my favorite thing in my make up bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in exchange for my honest opinion.   I think this highlighter is a beautiful shade, perfect for my skin tone. I use it on my bare face and it give it a beautiful dewy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect summer brightener, sheer, so easy to apply, and only need such a little amount it is very good value

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this highlighter. It doesn’t have a ton of pigment but if you’re looking for a “lit within glow” then this product is perfect for you. I tend to go for a more natural makeup look leaning slightly dewy. This highlighter blends perfectly with my other products and doesn’t lift any of the other products and it doesn’t make anything look muddy. I apply it with my fingertips and then go over it with a beauty sponge and wah la, beautiful natural highlight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love to combine my blush and highlighter and thought this would be a great option to bring me down from 2 products to 1, but there is no color payoff at all. in the photo I have multiple layers on the right side of my hand and you can barely see a thing. not to mention the color in the photo looks nothing like what I received, leans far more pink than coral and looks pretty flat in the container.   I was really hoping this would work but I'll stick to mixing my rare beauty blush and highlight.

reviews.review_title: I will never not use this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this last week not knowing when I was going to use it. Got home and used it with just my sunscreen i wear everyday and I was glowing! I have received so many compliments on my skin glowing!! This is the perfect natural glowing look item or wear to an event! It is absolutely fabulous!!
